page.title: 03Housing, Great Orton (cont)
page.content: There are 10, two and three bed- roomed houses on the Custy Steps estate. The remaining 6 homes are bungalows built especially for pensioners. In 1981, the Impact Housing Association, built 7, two bedroomed bungalows for pensioners. This estate was named Moor Close in recognition of the work of one of the Parish Councillors and school governers. Many of the remaining houses date back to the early 1800's or even earlier, but there are several modern bungalows which have been built during the last 20 years, often by their owners. Four new houses are in the process of erection and when completed, will be known as Mid-Town.
